author: Staff Reporter
Karthik Madhavan
text:
Train delayed

The Nilgiris Mountain Railway train that leaves the Mettupalayam Railway Junction at 7.10 a.m. for Udhagamandalam departed nearly an hour late on Saturday. According to sources, the delay in pumping the water required for the train led to the delay. As the water flow in the Bhavani River receded, water could not be supplied.
title: NMR train delayed
